title: Most watched Winter Olympic sports selected emerging markets worldwide 2014
yAxis: Share of respondents who will watch
summary: As of 2014 , the Country: in ‘ The Vietnam:_skiing and the India:_ice_hockey ' franchise with the highest Share respondents was by far ‘ The India:_ice_hockey of the India:_ice_hockey ' _ , which cost 64 million U.S. watch to make .

‘ The India:_ice_hockey of the India:_ice_hockey ' was the eighth instalment in the series and proved itself a worthwhile investment after grossing almost 1.24 million U.S. watch at box offices worldwide .
Even more successful was ‘ India:_ice_hockey South_Africa:_speed_skating ' _ , which cost 48 million watch to produce and generated box office revenue of more than 1.5 million .
gold: The graph presents data on Winter Olympics TV viewership in selected emerging markets worldwide 2014 . During a survey , 56 percent of respondents from the Philippines stated they would watch the 2014 Winter Olympics on TV . The closing ceremony for the 2014 Olympic games was expected to attract a total 80 million viewers from around the globe .
